activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3527
activity.text:
Current Status

1. Reviewed the Excel provided by Rajaneesh.

2. Creating New and Updating existing flows accordingly.

3. Had a design review call with Mayank and Viraj.

Next Steps

1. Finalize the updated flows.

2. Incorporate feedback from the call into the designs.

3. Validate changes and ensure alignment with requirements.

4. Share for review and feedback.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3399
activity.text: Design for BPP Application: Research and Design

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3399
activity.text:
**Date: March 13, 2025**
**Current Status**
1. Had an update meeting with Mayank and Viraj to discuss visualizations for onboarding providers/sellers to the BPP application.
2. Discussed the method of adding products, including form details.

**Next Steps**
1. Incorporate insights from the discussion into the design process.
2. Prepare initial wireframes and prototypes for review.
